title: Please help me identify this italic font...
content:
Hello everyone

I have been trying to identify this one for a while and couldn't do it. Very frustrating especially since I am sure I have seen it before.

Any help would be very much appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [alessandrini 238.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072133/http:/typophile.com/files/alessandrini%20238.jpg) | 63.7 KB |
author: David Rault

comments.content: I have found this in a filmtype catalogue, under the name Yerma. I don't know anything about the designer, if it was cut under other names, too, or whether it has ever been digitized.
Well - thank you very much indeed. I was on the verge of losing hope.
BTW, would you have any scan of it?
